title: Shows Error On Android Studio
body: When tries to add some new features Android Studio Shows Errors When Opening Thus Project on It

title: Add the possibility to login in
body: And do the actions available once you are logged in (rate, add comments, etc.)

title: Add 'People' tab
body:
Please add People tab which list all popular persons from TMDb.org.

https://www.themoviedb.org/person

title: Add movie's cast
body: Please add movie's cast and crew to the movie pages.

title: create a add to favourite option
body:
create an option tat can add our favourite movies list to our local storage 
and where can i change the api of tmdb?
where u had given it?

title: add movie lists
body:
It would be nice to have the ability to tag movies, for example movies I want to see next. The information is stored locally on the phone.

This idea could be generalized to create movie lists. For example "movies I want to see next", "movies I like / favorites", "movies I have", ...

title: Updated translations (pl+eo)
body: I corrected some strings in Polish translation; I also added Esperanto translation (which is unfortunately almost useless, because no one makes films in Esperanto, I've done it as 'exercise').

title: Trailer
body:
Hi mate, great work with the app, thanks alot.
Is it possible to add trailer links ? or embedded trailers on the page .. That would be really useful..
